ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage__c), "M5"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "M5")), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M6"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M4"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M4-"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"M7") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid next stage from M5. Allowed: M6, M4, M4-, M7.
